item.title: WWDC Memoji With Laptop
item.description: How to make WWDC Memoji with laptop? Go to imessage app and open conversation with yourself Navigate to memoji tab and find memoji with laptop Take a screenshot and crop it Open blank page in keynotes and paste your screenshot Change background using color picker in color section Add stickers to your memoji laptop Geek avatar - Done! Not sure if it useful to anyone, but i decided to share it.
